attributes.additional_details: Arrtical 50 was invoked by the whole palimentary team on all sides of the table. Why have they now decided to destroy democracy making most voters feel worthless to the point where the next turnout will be the lowest in history.
attributes.background: The referendum to leave the EU was a democratic vote and has been ignored. We need politicians to explain why they should be trusted going forward.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
